mapper.sql: STAND_ID, GOODS_ID, STANDTYPE_ID, STANDDESC, CREATETIME, STATE, REMARK
mapper.select: select STANDTYPE_ID, STANDTYPENAME from standtype order by STANDTYPE_ID ASC

select s.STAND_ID, s.GOODS_ID, s.STANDTYPE_ID, s.STANDDESC, s.CREATETIME, s.STATE, s.REMARK, st.STANDTYPENAME, g.GOODSNAME, sh.SHOP_ID, ifnull(f.FILEPATH,p.FILEPATH) as FILEPATH from s left join standtype st on s.standtype_id = st.standtype_id left join goods g on s.goods_id = g.goods_id left join ( SELECT * FROM file WHERE filetype = '1' GROUP BY reference_id ) p on g.goods_id = p.reference_id left join shop sh on g.shop_id = sh.shop_id left join file f on s.stand_id = f.reference_id and f.filetype = '3' where s.STAND_ID = #{STAND_ID}
